titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale Psychiatric Institute Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:44

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of administrative papers, committee minutes, and reports concerning the planning and construction of a new building for the Yale Psychiatric Institute (YPI, formerly the Department of Psychiatry).

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 27-E (YRG 27-E), Records of departments, offices, programs, and projects of the Yale School of Medicine.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale Psychiatric Institute Records (RU 454). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of administrative papers, committee minutes, and reports concerning the planning and construction of a new building for the Yale Psychiatric Institute (YPI, formerly the Department of Psychiatry).

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: The records of Myron Genel, Associate Dean, School of Medicine (RU 1131) contains a series (.5 linear feet) of subject files, affirmative action and development records of the Yale Psychiatric Institute.

did.unittitle: Barun Baru Associates: Long Range Plan
Commission on Hospitals and Health Care: Text of Public Statutes, etc.
Connecticut Commission on Hospitals and Health Care
